Headline: Purple Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Division/Elston
ShortDescription: Eastbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Elston. North Avenue, Halsted and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Elston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Elston. North Avenue, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Division, due to street blockage near Division/Elston.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
